title: JAX-RS minimal application (just quarkus-resteasy) is getting heavy, 120 jars vs 105 jars in 2.2.3.Final
body:
### Describe the bug

JAX-RS minimal application (just `quarkus-resteasy`) is getting heavy, 120 jars in 2.4.0.Final vs 105 jars in 2.2.3.Final, 11% increase in disk usage of quarkus-app

As quarkus-resteasy is matured extension and one of the most used one the impact of this regression can be quite wide.

This increase in disk footprint has implications for runtime
 - more classes need to be loaded
 - => it takes longer to boot the application
 - => more Metaspace gets used to keep class metadata => RSS gets bigger

```
2.3.1.Final / 2.4.0.Final / 999-SNAPSHOT
 30M	app-jax-rs-minimal/target/quarkus-app
 120 JAR files

2.2.3.Final
 27M	app-jax-rs-minimal/target/quarkus-app
 105  JAR files
```

Attaching list of jar files from the app
 - [app-jax-rs-minimal-2.4.0.txt](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/7458553/app-jax-rs-minimal-2.4.0.txt)
 - [app-jax-rs-minimal-2.2.3.txt](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/7458555/app-jax-rs-minimal-2.2.3.txt)

Can be compared for example with `code --diff ~/Downloads/app-jax-rs-minimal-2.2.3.txt ~/Downloads/app-jax-rs-minimal-2.4.0.txt`
Generated using `find app-jax-rs-minimal/target/quarkus-app | grep "jar$" | xargs basename | sort`

In the diff I see more `com.fasterxml.jackson.*` and `io.smallrye.reactive.*` artifacts in 2.4.0.Final.

### Expected behavior

Same / similar number of jar files and similar disk usage between Quarkus versions.

### Actual behavior

Increase in number of jar files and disk usage between Quarkus versions.
 - 120 jars in 2.4.0.Final vs. 105 jars in 2.2.3.Final
 - 11% increase in disk usage of quarkus-app

### How to Reproduce?

Get https://github.com/quarkus-qe/quarkus-startstop
```
mvn clean package -f app-jax-rs-minimal -Dquarkus.version=2.4.0.Final
du -cskh app-jax-rs-minimal/target/quarkus-app
find app-jax-rs-minimal/target/quarkus-app | grep "jar$" | wc -l
```
```
mvn clean package -f app-jax-rs-minimal -Dquarkus.version=2.2.3.Final
du -cskh app-jax-rs-minimal/target/quarkus-app
find app-jax-rs-minimal/target/quarkus-app | grep "jar$" | wc -l
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS BigSur

### Output of `java -version`

Java 11

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.4.0.Final and Quarkus main
